verses.verse: I say<WG3004> then<WG3361>, Did<WG683> God<WG2316> cast off<WG683> his<WG846> people<WG3361>? God forbid<WG1096>. For<WG1063> I<WG1473> also<WG2532> am<WG1510> an Israelite<WG2475>, of<WG1537> the seed<WG4690> of Abraham<WG11>, of the tribe<WG5443> of Benjamin<WG958>.

Or know<WG1492> ye not<WG3756> what<WG5101> the scripture<WG1124> saith<WG3004> of<WG1722> Elijah<WG2243>? how<WG5613> he pleadeth<WG1793> with God<WG2316> against<WG2596> Israel<WG2474>:

But <WG235> what<WG5101> saith<WG3004> the answer of God<WG5538> unto him<WG846>? I have left<WG2641> for myself<WG1683> seven thousand<WG2035> men<WG435>, who<WG3748> have<WG2578> not<WG3756> bowed<WG2578> the knee<WG1119> to<WG896> Baal<WG896>.
Even so<WG3779> then<WG3767> at<WG1722> this present<WG3568> time<WG2540> also<WG2532> there is<WG1096> a remnant<WG3005> according to<WG2596> the election<WG1589> of grace<WG5485>.
But <WG1161> if<WG1487> it<WG2076> is by grace<WG5485>, <WG3765> it is<WG1096> no more<WG3765> of<WG1537> works<WG2041>: otherwise<WG1893> grace<WG5485> is<WG2076> no more<WG3765> grace<WG5485>.

What <WG5101> then<WG3767>? that<WG5127> which<WG3739> Israel<WG2474> seeketh for<WG1934>, that he<WG2013> obtained<WG2013> not<WG3756>; but<WG1161> the election<WG1589> obtained it<WG2013>, and<WG1161> the rest<WG3062> were hardened<WG4456>:

according as<WG2531> it is written<WG1125>, God<WG2316> gave<WG1325> them<WG846> a spirit<WG4151> of stupor<WG2659>, eyes<WG3788> that they should<WG991> not<WG3361> see<WG991>, and<WG2532> ears<WG3775> that they should<WG191> not<WG3361> hear<WG191>, unto<WG2193> this<WG4594> very day<WG2250>.

And <WG2532> David<WG1138> saith<WG3004>, Let<WG1096> their<WG846> table<WG5132> be made1096, 1519 a snare<WG3803>, and2532, 1519 a trap<WG2339>, And2532, 1519 a stumblingblock<WG4625>, and2532, 1519 a recompense<WG468> unto them<WG846>:
Let <WG4654> their<WG846> eyes<WG3788> be darkened<WG4654>, that they may<WG991> not<WG3361> see<WG991>, And<WG2532> bow thou down<WG4781> their<WG846> back<WG3577> always<WG1275>.

I say<WG3004> then<WG3361>, Did they stumble<WG3361> that<WG2443> they might fall<WG3361>? God forbid<WG1096>: but<WG235> by<WG3900> their<WG846> fall<WG3900> salvation<WG4991> is come unto the Gentiles<WG1484>, to<WG1519> provoke<WG3863> them<WG846> to jealousy<WG3863>.

Now <WG1161> if<WG1487> their<WG846> fall<WG3900>, is the riches<WG4149> of the world<WG2889>, and<WG2532> their<WG846> loss<WG2275> the riches<WG4149> of the Gentiles<WG1484>; how much<WG4214> more<WG3123> their<WG846> fulness<WG4138>?

But <WG1063> I speak<WG3004> to you<WG5213> that are Gentiles<WG1909>. Inasmuch then as<WG3745> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> an apostle<WG652> of Gentiles<WG1484>, I glorify<WG1392> my<WG3450> ministry<WG1248>;
if <WG1487> by any means<WG4459> I may provoke to jealousy<WG3863> them that are my<WG3450> flesh<WG4561>, and<WG2532> may save<WG4982> some<WG5100> of<WG1537> them<WG846>.

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> the casting away<WG580> of them<WG846> is the reconciling<WG2643> of the world<WG2889>, what<WG5101> shall the receiving<WG4356> of them be<WG1487>, but<WG3361> life<WG2222> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>?
And <WG1161> if<WG1487> the firstfruit<WG536> is holy<WG40>, so<WG2532> is the lump<WG5445>: and<WG2532> if<WG1487> the root<WG4491> is holy<WG40>, so<WG2532> are the branches<WG2798>.

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> some<WG5100> of the branches<WG2798> were broken off<WG1575>, and<WG1161> thou<WG4771>, being<WG5607> a wild olive<WG65>, wast grafted<WG1461> in<WG1722> among them<WG846>, and<WG2532> didst become<WG1096> partaker<WG4791> with them of the root4491, 2532 of the fatness<WG4096> of the olive tree<WG1636>;

glory <WG2620> not<WG3361> over the branches<WG2798>: but<WG1161> if<WG1487> thou gloriest<WG2620>, it is not<WG3756> thou<WG4771> that bearest<WG941> the root<WG4491>, but<WG235> the root<WG4491> thee<WG4571>.

Well <WG2573>; by their unbelief<WG570> they were broken off<WG1575>, and<WG1161> thou<WG4771> standest<WG2476> by thy faith<WG4102>. Be<WG5309> not<WG3361> highminded<WG5309>, but<WG235> fear<WG5399>:
for <WG1063> if<WG1487> God<WG2316> spared<WG5339> not<WG3756> the<WG2798> natural<WG5449> branches<WG2798>, neither will he<WG5339> spare<WG5339> thee<WG4675>.

Behold <WG1492> then<WG3767> the goodness<WG5544> and<WG2532> severity<WG663> of God<WG2316>: toward<WG1909> them that fell<WG4098>, severity<WG663>; but<WG1161> toward<WG1909> thee<WG4571>, God<WG5544>'s goodness, if<WG1437> thou continue<WG1961> in<WG5544> his goodness<WG5544>: otherwise<WG1893> thou<WG4771> also<WG2532> shalt be cut off<WG1581>.

And <WG1161> they<WG1565> also<WG2532>, if<WG1437> they continue<WG1961> not3361, 1961 in their unbelief<WG570>, shall be grafted in<WG1461>: for<WG1063> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> able<WG1415> to graft<WG1461> them<WG846> in<WG1461> again<WG3825>.

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> thou<WG4771> wast cut out<WG1581> of<WG1537> that which is by<WG2596> nature<WG5449> a wild<WG65> olive tree<WG2532>, and wast grafted<WG1461> contrary to<WG3844> nature<WG5449> into<WG1519> a good olive tree<WG2565>; how much<WG4214> more<WG3123> shall<WG1461> these<WG3778>, which are3588, 2596 the natural<WG5449> branches<WG1461>, be grafted into their own<WG2398> olive tree<WG1636>?

For <WG1063> I would<WG2309> not<WG3756>, brethren<WG80>, have<WG2309> you<WG5209> ignorant<WG50> of this<WG5124> mystery<WG3466>, lest2443, 3361 ye be<WG5600> wise<WG5429> in<WG3844> your own conceits<WG1438>, that<WG3754> a hardening<WG4457> in<WG575> part<WG3313> hath befallen<WG1096> Israel<WG2474>, until<WG891> the fulness<WG4138> of the Gentiles<WG1484> be come in<WG1525>;

and <WG2532> so<WG3779> all<WG3956> Israel<WG2474> shall be saved<WG4982>: even as<WG2531> it is written<WG1125>, There shall come<WG2240> out of<WG1537> Zion<WG4622> the Deliverer<WG4506>; <WG2532> He shall turn away<WG654> ungodliness<WG763> from<WG575> Jacob<WG2384>:
And <WG2532> this<WG3778> is my<WG1700> covenant<WG1242> unto them<WG846>, When<WG3752> I shall take away<WG851> their<WG846> sins<WG266>.

As touching<WG2596> the gospel<WG2098>, they are enemies<WG2190> for<WG1223> your<WG5209> sake<WG1223>: but<WG1161> as touching<WG2596> the election<WG1589>, they are beloved<WG27> for<WG1223> the fathers<WG3962>' sake<WG1223>.
For <WG1063> the gifts<WG5486> and<WG2532> the calling<WG2821> of God<WG2316> are not repented of<WG278>.

For <WG1063> as<WG5618> ye<WG5210> in time past<WG4218> were disobedient<WG544> to God<WG2316>, but<WG1161> now<WG3568> have<WG1653> obtained mercy<WG1653> by<WG543> their<WG5130> disobedience<WG543>,

even so<WG3779> have<WG544> these<WG3778> also<WG2532> now<WG3568> been disobedient<WG544>, that<WG2443> by the mercy<WG1656> shown to you<WG5212> they<WG846> also<WG2532> may now obtain mercy<WG1653>.

For <WG3754> of<WG1537> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> through<WG1223> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> unto<WG1519> him<WG846>, are all things<WG3956>. To<WG1519> him<WG846> be the glory<WG1391> for<WG1519> ever<WG165>. Amen<WG281>.
